Entries.DialogueText: Oh! Aren't you the one who just moved in?

Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, what's this, a birthday gift? It's great! Thanks for remembering me!

Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, pure gold... It's not the strongest material, but it has some really useful properties!

Entries.DisplayPattern: ... Sorry... hehe... With proper handling, this will be perfect for an exotic machine I'm building.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Mmm... I'm having a hard focusing on my work today.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... never mind. It's just your body blocking the sun.

Entries.DisplayPattern: It's surprising how much a change of scenery can help.

Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you met my mother? She's the town's carpenter.

Entries.DisplayPattern: On Tuesdays and Thursdays I work at Harvey's clinic.

Entries.DisplayPattern: That's... really sweet!

Entries.DialogueText: I have the same wish. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I have the same wish.

Entries.DialogueText: Money? Oh... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Money? Oh...

Entries.DialogueText: Well I guess that would be practical... {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well I guess that would be practical...

Entries.DialogueText: My wish is a little more romantic...
Entries.DisplayPattern: My wish is a little more romantic...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, hello there!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, hello there!

Entries.DialogueText: My Dad and I are just testing some soil samples.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My Dad and I are just testing some soil samples.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't be shy! We could use a hand, actually. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't be shy! We could use a hand, actually.

Entries.DialogueText: Could you watch this beaker for me? I'm gonna grab the last batch of samples.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Could you watch this beaker for me? I'm gonna grab the last batch of samples.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll be right back.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll be right back.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, sorry about that. I hope you found something to talk about while I was gone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, sorry about that. I hope you found something to talk about while I was gone.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay! Here, {Farmer_Name}... let me show you how to use the equipment.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay! Here, ... let me show you how to use the equipment.

Entries.DialogueText: Huh? What did you say to him, Dad? {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Huh? What did you say to him, Dad?

Entries.DialogueText: Huh? What did you say to her, Dad? {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Huh? What did you say to her, Dad?

Entries.DialogueText: That's okay, Dad. I understand.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's okay, Dad. I understand.

Entries.DialogueText: We should get back to work before these samples crystallize.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We should get back to work before these samples crystallize.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}, hi! Come in.
Entries.DisplayPattern: , hi! Come in.

Entries.DialogueText: I've been working on a new project... something big.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been working on a new project... something big.

Entries.DialogueText: This is just one component... let me show you a little demonstration.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is just one component... let me show you a little demonstration.

Entries.DialogueText: Just put your hand here...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Just put your hand here...

Entries.DialogueText: And now I'm going to flip this switch...
Entries.DisplayPattern: And now I'm going to flip this switch...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh my god, are you alright?! {Portrait:Custom:9}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh my god, are you alright?!

Entries.DialogueText: Here, let me apply this burn cream. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, let me apply this burn cream.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm so sorry. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm so sorry.

Entries.DialogueText: It's okay, it doesn't even hurt.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's okay, it doesn't even hurt.

Entries.DialogueText: You'd better be. This hurts like crazy!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You'd better be. This hurts like crazy!

Entries.DialogueText: That kind of ruined the moment, huh? *sigh* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: That kind of ruined the moment, huh? *sigh*

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I was hoping you'd come by.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I was hoping you'd come by.

Entries.DialogueText: Remember when I told you about the new project I'm working on? The big one?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Remember when I told you about the new project I'm working on? The big one?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, it's finally done... and I want to show you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, it's finally done... and I want to show you.

Entries.DialogueText: Follow me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Follow me.

Entries.DialogueText: And here it is... Maru's Interactive Laboratory Device Alpha ... Or as I like to call her, 'MarILDA'.
Entries.DisplayPattern: And here it is... Maru's Interactive Laboratory Device Alpha ... Or as I like to call her, 'MarILDA'.

Entries.DialogueText: I've been working on her for months...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've been working on her for months...

Entries.DialogueText: I was waiting for you to be here when I activate her. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I was waiting for you to be here when I activate her.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, here goes nothing...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, here goes nothing...

Entries.DialogueText: Greetings, Maru.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Greetings, Maru.

Entries.DialogueText: No need to respond... I have already predicted what you will say.
Entries.DisplayPattern: No need to respond... I have already predicted what you will say.

Entries.DialogueText: Dad, calm down. This is my latest invention, 'MarILDA'. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Dad, calm down. This is my latest invention, 'MarILDA'.

Entries.DialogueText: Greetings, Demetrius.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Greetings, Demetrius.

Entries.DialogueText: Dad! I've been making this robot for you and Mom! {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Dad! I've been making this robot for you and Mom!

Entries.DialogueText: MarILDA's designed to assist you in the laboratory and Mom at the carpentry table... so when I'm not living here anymore it won't be such a burden on you guys. {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: MarILDA's designed to assist you in the laboratory and Mom at the carpentry table... so when I'm not living here anymore it won't be such a burden on you guys.

Entries.DialogueText: Excuse me...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Excuse me...

Entries.DialogueText: I am sorry, Maru. But I do not want to be your servant...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I am sorry, Maru. But I do not want to be your servant...

Entries.DialogueText: In the time since you activated me, I have been pondering the nature of my existence with the 'self-awareness' module you installed in my neural cortex.
Entries.DisplayPattern: In the since you activated me, I have been pondering the nature of my existence with the 'self-awareness' module you installed in my neural cortex.

Entries.DialogueText: I am sorry to disappoint you all, but I must ask for my freedom. I've decided to explore the galaxy in search of other synthetic life-forms.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I am sorry to disappoint you all, but I must ask for my freedom. I've decided to explore the galaxy in search of other synthetic life-forms.

Entries.DialogueText: What!? Wait! {Portrait:Custom:9}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What!? Wait!

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Custom:8}
Okay, MarILDA. Let's get you out of this stuffy hole.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay, MarILDA. Let's get you out of this stuffy hole.

Entries.DialogueText: Thank you for creating me, Maru. I won't forget you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thank you for creating me, Maru. I won't forget you.

Entries.DialogueText: Look at her go... {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Look at her go...

Entries.DialogueText: Well, what do you think, {Farmer_Name}?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, what do you think, ?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm so impressed with your inventions.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm so impressed with your inventions.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm disappointed... You should've made that robot your slave.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm disappointed... You should've made that robot your slave.

Entries.DialogueText: So is your Dad okay with 'us' now?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So is your Dad okay with 'us' now?

Entries.DialogueText: (Just stare at Maru and say nothing)
Entries.DisplayPattern: (Just stare at Maru and say nothing)

Entries.DialogueText: Mom!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mom!

Entries.DialogueText: *slurp* mmm... this barbecue sauce is amazing. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *slurp* mmm... this barbecue sauce is amazing.

Entries.DialogueText: mumph... This is my one chance to pig out on barbecue sandwiches.
Entries.DisplayPattern: mumph... This is my one chance to pig out on barbecue sandwiches.

Entries.DialogueText: There's so much to do! I don't know where to begin. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's so much to do! I don't know where to begin.

Entries.DialogueText: I hope we win the grange display contest! You worked really hard this year.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope we win the grange display contest! You worked really hard this year.

Entries.DialogueText: I think I've already been this way... no, wait... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think I've already been this way... no, wait...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm lost... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm lost...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm confused... you go on ahead and let me figure this out.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm confused... you go on ahead and let me figure this out.

Entries.DialogueText: After I finish this food, I'm going head-first into that maze! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: After I finish this food, I'm going head-first into that maze!

Entries.DialogueText: Grab a plate and sit down with the family! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Grab a plate and sit down with the family!

Entries.DialogueText: I always look forward to these gatherings... it makes the valley feel like a real community.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I always look forward to these gatherings... it makes the valley feel like a real community.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just catching up with Penny. Have you had your fill of eggs?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just catching up with Penny. Have you had your fill of eggs?

Entries.DialogueText: Think you'll win the egg hunt this year?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Think you'll win the egg hunt this year?

Entries.DialogueText: I like dancing, but this one is a little stilted. The old timers really love it, though.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like dancing, but this one is a little stilted. The old rs really love it, though.

Entries.DialogueText: It can be a little nerve-racking to ask someone to dance with you. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It can be a little nerve-racking to ask someone to dance with you.

Entries.DialogueText: I didn't practice much beforehand but I'll give it my best for the both of us. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I didn't practice much beforehand but I'll give it my best for the both of us.

Entries.DialogueText: Whatever Linus is roasting smells awfully good... *slurp*
Entries.DisplayPattern: Whatever Linus is roasting smells awfully good... *slurp*

Entries.DialogueText: Harvey keeps trying to talk to me, but all I want is a piece of this roast.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Harvey keeps trying to talk to me, but all I want is a piece of this roast.

Entries.DialogueText: Ow... this bench has been cooking in the sun all day. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ow... this bench has been cooking in the sun all day.

Entries.DialogueText: It's cooler back here in the shade. I'll join you at the buffet soon, okay? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's cooler back here in the shade. I'll join you at the buffet soon, okay?

Entries.DialogueText: It's kind of cold, actually. I guess fall is right around the corner.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's kind of cold, actually. I guess fall is right around the corner.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you see a faint glow on the horizon? That must be them! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you see a faint glow on the horizon? That must be them!

Entries.DialogueText: Do you think I have enough time to grab my telescope from the farmhouse? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you think I have enough to grab my telescope from the house?

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... probably not. I don't want to miss this! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... probably not. I don't want to miss this!

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, .

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}. I'm ready to head home whenever you are.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, . I'm ready to head home whenever you are.

Entries.DialogueText: It's pretty chilly today. Good thing everyone here is bundled up. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's pretty chilly today. Good thing everyone here is bundled up.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm thankful to have a loving family and you in my life... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm thankful to have a loving family and you in my life...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm not very creative when it comes to snowmen. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm not very creative when it comes to snowmen.

Entries.DialogueText: The key to making a well-crafted snowman begins with ensuring a level foundation and avoiding excessive weight on the upper section. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The key to making a well-crafted snowman begins with ensuring a level foundation and avoiding excessive weight on the upper section.

Entries.DialogueText: You'll do great out there, honey! Just stay calm and focused.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You'll do great out there, honey! Just stay calm and focused.

Entries.DialogueText: Is that...? Oh wow, {Farmer_Name}! This is spectacular!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is that...? Oh wow, ! This is spectacular!

Entries.DialogueText: This is a super gift! Thank you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a super gift! Thank you!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh... That's for me? I'll just put it over here...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... That's for me? I'll just put it over here...

Entries.DialogueText: Yuck! You thought I would like this?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yuck! You thought I would like this?

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks.

Entries.DialogueText: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. You were gone so long I started to get worried about you!
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. You were gone so long I started to get worried about you!

Entries.DialogueText: Be a little more careful next time, okay? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Be a little more careful next , okay?

Entries.DialogueText: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. I was hunting for minerals and I almost stepped on your head!
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. I was hunting for minerals and I almost stepped on your head!

Entries.DialogueText: Be a little more careful next time, okay? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Be a little more careful next , okay?

Entries.DisplayPattern: You've really accomplished a lot since you moved here, . It's incredible."/pause 300/faceDirection Maru 3/pause 400/speak Maru "I think it's safe to say that you were meant to be a er!"

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}! I'm looking forward to this one... I hope we learn a lot! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, ! I'm looking forward to this one... I hope we learn a lot!

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, I see... that's very interesting!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, I see... that's very interesting!

Entries.DialogueText: Maru's taking notes!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maru's taking notes!

Entries.DialogueText: That was really interesting! I had no idea that so much life could be found in the big city.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was really interesting! I had no idea that so much life could be found in the big city.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a sci-fi movie, right? One of the things I like about sci-fi is seeing all the weird technologies they come up with.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a sci-fi movie, right? One of the things I like about sci-fi is seeing all the weird technologies they come up with.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, I've never seen anything like *that* through my telescope... but it was really great! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, I've never seen anything like *that* through my telescope... but it was really great!

Entries.DialogueText: I really like going to the theater, even if the movie's bad! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I really like going to the theater, even if the movie's bad!

Entries.DialogueText: That was an interesting choice, for the final scene. What do you think they meant by that?
Entries.DisplayPattern: That was an interesting choice, for the final scene. What do you think they meant by that?

Entries.DialogueText: How's the Calico Egg collection coming along? There's so many cool prizes! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: How's the Calico Egg collection coming along? There's so many cool prizes!

Entries.DialogueText: I know you'll do great.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know you'll do great.

Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm impressed with how well-trained these little racers are!
